alert.note: Alert for Haakon (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 22 at 2:28AM MDT until August 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 104 expected. * WHERE...Haakon County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the Heat Advisory, from noon today to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. To stay cool, go to an air-conditioned public building or stay indoors, close window shades and curtains, and use air conditioners or electric fans to cool rooms. Check on vulnerable neighbors, relatives, and friends to ensure they are safe.
